moreInfo: Johnny Bench hit 389 home runs during his career.  Entering the 2021 season, Joey Votto is the active home run leader with 295, ranking him 3rd.

moreInfo: Bid McPhee stole 568 bases from 1882 - 1899.

question: Who is the all time leader in Wins?
moreInfo: Eppa Rixey played for the Reds from 1921 - 1933, winning 179 games.

question: Who is the all time leader in Strikeouts?
moreInfo: Jim Maloney struck out 1,592 batters during his Reds career from 1960 - 1970.

question: Who is the all time leader in saves?
moreInfo: From 1997 - 2005, Danny Graves saved 182 games.

question: Which of the following nicknames was NOT used by Cincinnati?
moreInfo: From 1882 - 1889, Cincinnati was known as the Red Stockings. Since 1890, Cincinnati has been know as the Reds.  Except during the 1954 - 1958 seasons, when Cincinnati went by the Redlegs.

question: Which player did NOT win a Golden Glove as a member of the Reds?
moreInfo: Johnny Edwards won in 1963 & 1964.  Pokey Reese won in 1999 & 2000.  Tucker Barnhart won in 2017 & 2020
